title: How to unsubscribe from The Village Україна
description: Learn how to cancel your The Village Україна subscription. You can manage your subscription through Privat24 or LiqPay. If you encounter issues, contact their support team for assistance.

steps_1.title: Cancel Subscription via Online Payment Service
steps_1.description:
To cancel your 'The Village Україна' subscription, follow these steps:

*   Go to Privat24 or LiqPay service.
*   Log in to your account.
*   Find the subscription management section.
*   Locate your 'The Village Україна' subscription.
*   Select the option to cancel the subscription.
*   Confirm the cancellation request.

steps_2.title: Cancel Subscription via Email Support
steps_2.description:
If you encounter any issues canceling your subscription through the online payment service, you can contact customer support via email:

*   Contact editor@the-village.com.ua.
*   Include the last four digits of your credit card and the subscription date in your email.

seo_text: Cancel The Village Україна subscription. Manage The Village Україна subscription. The Village Україна cancellation guide.
